items.sentence: Tom tried to catch the ball with his left hand, but he wasn\'t able to.
I wonder how Tom will ever manage to pay for such an expensive wedding.
It\'s not a good idea to try studying and watching TV at the same time.
Tom and I run into each other at the supermarket every once in a while.
Tom and Mary argue a lot, but they still get along quite well together.
Tom and Mary got married three weeks after they graduated from college.
Although French isn\'t Tom\'s native language, he speaks it quite well.
Tom has promised to pay back the money he owes by the end of the month.
Tom didn\'t have a chance to visit Mary the last time he was in Boston.
Tom wouldn\'t be too surprised if Mary decided to accept the job offer.
Tom was a pretty good French teacher and I learned French very quickly.
I wonder whether or not Tom has told Mary she doesn\'t need to do that.
I wonder whether or not there\'s any possibility that Tom will do that.
Tom doesn\'t want to go through another experience like the one he had.
Tom continued to play his banjo even after everybody asked him to stop.
Tom didn\'t have enough change to buy a drink from the vending machine.
I need to hide these Christmas presents somewhere Tom can\'t find them.
I still don\'t understand why Tom would want to do something like that.
I think that it\'s unlikely that I\'ll be able to pass my driving test.
I\'m going to spend the New Year\'s holiday this year relaxing at home.
